r2 < 80k

3.3V
	r1/r2=((3.3/.8)-1)=3.125
	r1=47k
	r2=15k

	(47*1.01)/(15*.99)=3.1966329966	=> vout=3.3573063973
	(47*.99)/(15*1.01)=3.0712871287 => vout=3.257029703


1.8V
	r1/r2=((1.8/.8)-1)=1.25
	r1=15k
	r2=12k

	(15*1.01)/(12*.99)=1.2752525253 => vout=1.8202020202
	(15*.99)/(12*1.01)=1.2252475248 => vout=1.7801980198


1.2V
	r1/r2=((1.2/.8)-1)=0.5
	r1=10k
	r2=20k

	(10*1.01)/(20*.99)=0.5101010101 => vout=1.2080808081
	(10*.99)/(20*1.01)=0.4900990099 => vout=1.1920792079
